alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 22 at 4:45PM CDT until August 23 at 7:38AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... East Fork Trinity River Near Crandall affecting Ellis, Dallas and Kaufman Counties. For the East Fork Trinity River...including McKinney, Crandall... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork Trinity River Near Crandall. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor out of banks flooding is expected. Caution should be exercised near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 18.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
